website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy hairbrush cleaner that's easy to use and clean up after.
pros: Made of sturdy plastic with ergonomic handle
cons: Some say it's not as effective at removing fuzz and debris other than hair

customer_reviews.title: Good quality brush cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: Much better quality than expected! It's made of sturdy plastic and bristles. Just what I needed and a better style for the purpose of cleaning brushes. I have one for hair brushes and another for household brushes. Both ends are useful for getting all the lint and bits out.
customer_reviews.author: P. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of them...one for our hair brushes and one for our Roomba! It is sturdy and really gets all the hair...much better than the others on the market that bend too easily when used. Worth the price and will last a long time! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: dlszonn

customer_reviews.title: It's alright.
customer_reviews.text: It does the trick, but not incredibly well on round brushes or shorter hairs trapped in brushes. Wire brush cleaners work better if you can get them but this will do in a pinch. Much easier than trying to clean a brush without a tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works just fine.
customer_reviews.text: It did a decent job, although not as thorough or as easy as the old-style flexible wire ones. However, unlike the old-style flexible wire ones, it also kept its shape and stored better. I didn't have to rubber band the wires together either.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Cleans hairbrushes easily!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this hairbrush cleaning tool many years ago and just love it! I wanted to buy it for friends, but couldn’t find it. I even asked my hairdresser, but she couldn’t find it either. I was so happy to see it on Amazon and ordered 4 of them to give as gifts. It works really well on regular hairbrushes and even easily cleans shampoo brushes. Great buy! Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT I NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: The tool is great for getting into those hard to reach spots in your brush or comb. It is very important for sanitization to have all the hair and linty bits gone before a good hot water wash.
customer_reviews.author: JUNEBUG51

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I’m a professional stylist and the supply stores used to carry these, I think they’re the best for getting hair out of brushes. I had purchased the wet brush one but it was garbage so happy to have found this!
customer_reviews.author: Yoda2269

customer_reviews.title: Broken teeth!
customer_reviews.text: Just received these brushes and the teeth of the comb are broken! Will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Roswell

customer_reviews.title: Not very useful
customer_reviews.text: The wore-like teeth were bent and when I tried using them to clean my brush, they mostly bent. Really did not do the job. I bought 2, thinking I’d give one to my sister but now I will not. The teeth on the rigid plastic “ comb” end imo are not close enough together - also did not perform well. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: I am currently in beauty school and we have to sanitize our kits everyday and this took is perfect for getting hair out of brushes and fast to do.
customer_reviews.author: Arely Alvidrez

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: This tool makes hair brush cleaning a breeze. So much easier than using a comb. No effort to use. Wish I knew about before now. I’m so pleased I bought this. If I could give more than 5 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Bottled water drinker

customer_reviews.title: Okay, a little overpriced
customer_reviews.text: It mostly works. If it had come with instructions for how to clean various kinds of brushes, would have been more useful.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Was not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get the little balls of lint to come off the tips of the brush with this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Touted as a favorite or best of item and doesn’t do anything special. Waste of money really. My brush has little “balls” at the end of the bristles and this tool doesn’t get the lint off of them.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Barleben

customer_reviews.title: Best product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this neat little gadget. Makes it so much easier to clean my brushes! Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn M

customer_reviews.title: Brush cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Not really what I thought. It doesn’t seem too sturdy and doesn’t get the hair out. Teeth should be closer
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Bonanni

customer_reviews.title: Does the job quickly and safely!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased another type of hairbrush cleaner that looked like a short fat handled wire rake. It did an okay job but the wires pierced my fingers drawing blood one time too often!! So I searched and happy to say I found this inexpensive tool which is well made, does the job quickly and is easy to clean. Best of all . . . it's a bloodless task!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The bristles are flimsy, I bent a few of them while trying to clean one of my brushes. It’s a waste of money, don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nyx09

customer_reviews.title: efficient tool
customer_reviews.text: An efficient tool to clean hair brushes. Had to try it out right away and am pleased with the job it did. Would recommend product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job removing the hair and stuff from my brush. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep my grooming brushes clean
customer_reviews.text: I use this to clean my cat brushes after grooming appointments and I love it! Maintains professional looking cleanliness (with a little help from a disinfectant too)
customer_reviews.author: catgrrl

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my hubby's boar bristle beard brush (say that 5 times fast). Really gets in between the bristles to get out all the dead skin slough and little beard hairs.
customer_reviews.author: W. Boe

customer_reviews.title: Cool tool!
customer_reviews.text: Surprised by how well this worked - I had low expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: BRUSH THOSE COMBS & BRUSHES.
customer_reviews.text: BEEN LOOKING FOR THIS ITEM FOR AWHILE. HAPPY AMAZON HAD IT. I USED IT ON MY HAIR BRUSHES AND COMBS AND IT APPEARS TO WORK VERY WELL. GLAD I HAVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: LADY LYNDA

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient and effective
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use! Much more effective than using my comb to remove hair strands and dust and lint from my hairbrush.
customer_reviews.author: cdgChgo

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, i could not find one of these at any store, so I went online
customer_reviews.author: Diana Luttrell

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy cleaning tool that does the job well. I used it to remove the hair from my velcro hair rollers as well as my brushes. I am happy that I purchased two.
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: Beats the old "Use a comb to clean a brush" method
customer_reviews.text: I was really non-committal when I ordered this product but; WOW! My brushes are nearly as nice and clean and pretty as the day they were purchased. I'm gonna' get another one for my pet grooming brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Buckles

customer_reviews.title: works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: works perfect on getting all the hair and guck out of hairbrushes. Also used it on hair rollers. Did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D.

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing
customer_reviews.text: right after a chop, i dont wash my hair to save progress, i use this to clean my brush, and after the 3rd time my hair and my brush is clean of residual.
customer_reviews.author: Apaullo

customer_reviews.title: ... what I want it to - it does a fine job of cleaning my hair brushes
customer_reviews.text: This item does exactly what I want it to - it does a fine job of cleaning my hair brushes, and is easy to clean itself.
customer_reviews.author: LMN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cleaning Tool
customer_reviews.text: A useful tool for cleaning your combs and brushes. I have used one for many years and have been very satisfied. Bought this one for my granddaughter .
customer_reviews.author: Pannonia

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved this tool. Received it on time and As stated in the listing
customer_reviews.author: brf2

customer_reviews.title: Plastic hair brush cleaner works good
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning tool takes a lot of the hair out of the brush. works great. The tool is plastic bristles that is pretty sturdy holds up.
customer_reviews.author: cher

customer_reviews.title: Hair brush has never been so clean😊
customer_reviews.text: Used to clean favorite hair brush. (I’ve only had it for 20 years!)
customer_reviews.author: Julie Carterson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My hair sheds horribly but this Cleans my round brush with ease
customer_reviews.author: Laura R Long

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This tool is excellent at cleaning hair brushes. I highly recommend it. Seems durable as well.
customer_reviews.author: jjy

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job!  Very Solid.
customer_reviews.text: Boy does this do the trick. Cleans my brushes thoroughly and quickly. So glad I purchased it. And it feels very solid.
customer_reviews.author: Marni

customer_reviews.title: This product is by far the best at cleaning hair brushes that I have used
customer_reviews.text: This product is by far the best at cleaning hair brushes that I have used. It definitely exceeded my expectations removing hair, etc. from the entire bristle. Of sturdy construction. Yes, I recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: SuniDaz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use; cleaned hairbrush impeccably
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. So easy to get the small pieces of lint out with the brush end. I’m a little uptight about everything being clean, and this definitely met my needs. I’m likely to purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Steff

customer_reviews.title: Good Brush Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Does a very good job on brushes. Much better than my previous cleaner. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Thawyzard

customer_reviews.title: Cleans out brush way better than a comb!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think this would do a better job than a fine toothed comb. I was so wrong! This tool was a great purchase, it totally cleans out my brush. A comb is no match.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functions perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful. Easy and quick to use. Very happy I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: foxtrot

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: wish had this a long time ago love, going to get one for Christmas gift
customer_reviews.author: Joan of arc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This works great, makes my brushes all look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: SM7856

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I do a weekly clean with 3 hair brushes and this is a must have
customer_reviews.author: Darius

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well for getting the hair out. Not so much the little pieces of fuzz from clothes.
customer_reviews.author: M. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Don't throwout your yucky hair brush without giving this tool a try.
customer_reviews.text: It was everything I expected, and cleaned my hair brush better than anything I've tried before.
customer_reviews.author: fender

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WORK
customer_reviews.text: NOT WORTH THE MONEY - THEY REALLY DON'T CLEAN A BRUSH WELL AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Efficient Brush Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I like the extra comb cleaner at the opposite end of the cleaning tool. This product is sturdier than the previous brush cleaner than I had. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hawley

customer_reviews.title: Works okay for what you pay
customer_reviews.text: It came with one of the five picks broken. It took some of the hair out but not all, guess I was expecting much more due to the reviews, but it works fine for the price you pay.
customer_reviews.author: marlew

customer_reviews.title: Brush Cleaner Good to Go
customer_reviews.text: Glad to have a new brush cleaner after years of an old one. this works well and is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret R MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job
customer_reviews.text: this little tool does a good job of cleaning my hair out of my brush. I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Pattyann

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Hairbrush Cleaning Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hair brush cleaning tool I have every had. Truly removes all the hair from my brushes!
customer_reviews.author: Nilda M. Santiago

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing going. Wish I had discovered it much sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Cissy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This does a great job on removing the hair from my brush and cleaning my comb.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Wood

customer_reviews.title: Reaches Every surface of the brush
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was quick and fast works great when cleaning my brushes. Get deep and reaches every surface of the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product delivered promptly!
customer_reviews.text: This brush does a great job and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Hutson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for helping to thoroughly clean bristles and remove built up.
customer_reviews.author: James-Anthony Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made of Sturdy plastic. Cleaned my brushes well. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: lysse

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job well
customer_reviews.text: Well.....what can you say...it does exactly what it's supposed to do ...and well too :-)
customer_reviews.author: S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Item came came as described.
customer_reviews.text: Item came as described. Didn’t use it yet. I will follow up in future. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Genell Davis

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: As a comb cleaner it did not perform as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Cronin

customer_reviews.title: You might not know you need this...but you do!
customer_reviews.text: After searching for awhile, I finally decided on buying the Velvet Touch Paddle Suprent Detangling Brush to use on my hair in the shower. This was a recommended product to go with it. I am glad I purchased it as well! Usually I just use a comb to clean the hair out of my brushes but that can damage/remove the tips. Love this product as it safely removes the hair and doesn’t damage the brush. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: TSue2222

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I keep this device in the drawer with my hairbrushes so it is handy to use as I put the brush away each time. This is a second purchase for convenience. I keep a hairbrush downstairs, too and wanted another to make it easier to clean my hairbrush there. Easy to hold and hasn't been damaged yet and I'm none too gentle using or putting away.
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: Works even better than it promises!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this comb cleaner expecting to throw the $ spent in the trash. I have tons of combs that I thought would likely be just as effective but for some reason decided to give it a shot. Beyond impressed for such a simple concept. Works so much better than anything else I’ve used over the years and works on all of my brushes with different types of bristles. Every female should have one of these and that’s coming from someone who gets wholesale beauty products!
customer_reviews.author: Ash2Ash

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This works great! I tried it on an old, large round brush and within 10 minutes it was thoroughly cleaned of old hair and intra-bristle clumps and ready to be washed. Save some money by recycling old brushes instead of throwing them out. This is an indispensable tool.
customer_reviews.author: cek

customer_reviews.title: It Works Well!
customer_reviews.text: This little cleaner tool does exactly what it says it will do. My hairbrush looks new again! I had tried everything to clean it out - this was the last step before replacing my hairbrush that is pricey - it saved money!
customer_reviews.author: L. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for mutiple brush types
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to clear out all the old hair stuck in my brushes that I felt was affecting the state of my scalp and hair. This does the job perfectly, and works on both my wet hair detangling brushes, my combs as well as my blowdrying brushes.
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: This cleaning tool does NOT work to clean a man’s ...
customer_reviews.text: This cleaning tool does NOT work to clean a man’s long skinny comb that has teeth that are close together. I could spend an hour and probably force it to work. I can see this tool working well when the comb’s teeth are spread out a bit, but not on the standard men’s short or long black comb.
customer_reviews.author: TheSergeantMajor

customer_reviews.title: Buy One For Every Bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I have always had long hair and lots of it as has my daughter. I am never without one of these, in fact I keep several around in every bathroom as I can’t stand hair left in brushes. This works amazing!!! BUY SEVERAL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elle's Belles

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it works
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if this actually does anything. I've tried it several times, but I think it's almost easier to remove the hair from your brushes with your hands. I purchased it because I wanted to get the stubborn hairs out, but the tool isn't strong enough to pick them up. It's a nice idea, but it's really not a necessary purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it cleans my brushes great. I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Makes cleaning my brushes a breeze.
customer_reviews.text: This tool is a must for keeping my brushes clean and hair free! By the end of a busy day in the salon, I usually have 5-8 brushes to clean and sanitize. Removing the debris is the first step and this tool makes it so easy to do!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Wagberg

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning hair brushes
customer_reviews.text: My purchase for buying this tool was to remove the little rings of lint at the base of each bristle. The tool is interesting but so far I still can not remove this even when trying with the brush wet.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: These combing teeth bent the first time I used them. They remove some hair and fuzz however not all.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My hair stylist mentioned to me about this product and I am very satisfied with it! Easy to use and removes all the hair & fuzzy on your brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: A good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time a few weeks ago. It cleaned my Torino Pro Wave Brush very well. The tool is large and sturdy. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike. C.

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Hairbrush Cleaning Brush
customer_reviews.text: It was great removing hair and build up residue on my hairbrushes. Hubby's brush still had residue left at the top of the bristle prior to the 'knob'. Overall, it was better than anything I've used in the past and for the low cost, it's worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These work great
customer_reviews.text: These are great for cleaning my hair brushes. Gets all the hair and other stuff like fuzz out of my hairbrushes so that I can wash them without having hair all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: A very good product. Very easy to use, good price, fast shipping and easy to clean..
customer_reviews.author: LAWRENCE R. BACCI

customer_reviews.title: Best gadget for removing hair from hairbrushes.
customer_reviews.text: I tried those flimsy wired hair removal gadgets that always break away from the handle and the wires get twisted and bent. This item is heavy duty enough to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The job does what it is designed to do. It got my husband's brush clean as new!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Kipilo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. This cleaned out my round brush in a matter of minutes. Great for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Marlo A. N. Stivison

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: I got right to work and cleaned every hairbrush in the house! It’s wonderful! Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: KansasMom411

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: If you’ve ever had a problem with your hair breaking or falling out you know what your brushes look like. This tool really does the trick. I have one for the house and one for when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Carolee Reed

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: When the bundles of wire on a handle were better made- (by Fuller Brush) they were better than these, but now I'm not sure that this isn't better than the currently available cheap ones. They won't get all the hairs out of the bristles, just the major part of the hair. Pity.
customer_reviews.author: Tchipakkan

customer_reviews.title: This works even better than I hoped
customer_reviews.text: This works even better than I hoped! We have hard water so lime scale builds up on anything wet. Brushing wet hair after shampooing creates a hard film buildup. This tool removes it easily. Wow!
customer_reviews.author: Karen In Vermont

customer_reviews.title: Real deal
customer_reviews.text: Awesome is your a 360 waver !! Didn’t realize how dirty my brush is . This in conjunction with washing your brush will make your brush super clean
customer_reviews.author: Ras

customer_reviews.title: Brush cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Did a good job cleaning the brush. I bought a second brush for my daughter. Did a good job on both short and long hair.
customer_reviews.author: MitziMc

customer_reviews.title: Daughter says it is life changing.
customer_reviews.text: The thing you never knew you needed till you had it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: This cleaning brush absolutely works for cleaning hair brushes
customer_reviews.text: The brush worked great. It made sense it was Amazon's Choice. It is imperative to keep a hair brush clean for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Tek6

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible product I never thought that my combs would be so dirty. He cleaned them wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Chávez

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job cleaning brushes.
customer_reviews.text: This does a pretty good job of cleaning my hair brushes. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M

customer_reviews.title: Great Product...
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a heated round brush and it works perfectly...
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Lover

customer_reviews.title: Hair Brush Cleaning Tool
customer_reviews.text: My hair is long & brushes always fills of hair after a few weeks. Tried this for the dryer roller brush & it was GREAT! I definitely think all of us will love it!
customer_reviews.author: GoodNeighbor

customer_reviews.title: Its okay, however, it doesn't pick everything out ...
customer_reviews.text: Its okay, however, it doesn't pick everything out of the brush, so you need to keep on until it all comes out.
customer_reviews.author: BKECD

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm on brushes or combs! I love how easy it is to use!
customer_reviews.author: sitznsnooze

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool
customer_reviews.text: Clean all my brushes with this little tool and now that look brand new. I also used it on my curling iron brush..
customer_reviews.author: Shell-Ports VA

customer_reviews.title: hair brush cleaning tool
customer_reviews.text: Its Ok to use but my expectations for this product to clean my hairbrushes were not met.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Hair Brush Cleaning Cleaner Tool-Black
feature_bullets: Easy removal of tangled knots of hair around the base and bristles of the brush.
Long bristles sweep away styling aid residues.
Unique 5-pik design for hard to reach areas.
Plastic Hair Brush Cleaner, Suitable for Most of hair brush types.
A useful tool for cleaning and removing hair from your brushes
